title: Harpers Ferry National Historical Park: Donate
body: Donate       How to Donate to the Park: Thank you for your interest in supporting Harpers Ferry National Historical Park. Your donation will enhance the programs and activities to protect park resources and the visitor experience at Harpers Ferry. The National Park Service has a proud tradition of celebrating charitable support, and philanthropic contributions continue to make a significant difference in the parks everyday. We truly appreciate your interest in being part of this legacy. There are several ways to support us: Direct Donations   The park is able to accept direct donations. If you are interested in donating directly to the park you may contact the Superintendent by phone 304-535-6224 or by e-mail.  Donations may be made out to National Park Service and sent to: Superintendent Harpers Ferry National Historical Park P.O. Box 65 Harpers Ferry, WV 25425 We are unable to accept donations online at this time.  Support Our Official Park Partner:   Harpers Ferry Historical Association is a non-profit organization whose mission is to protect, preserve and enhance programming at Harpers Ferry NHP. They rely on the generosity of private individuals, foundations, and corporations to support national park projects and programs.  Make a donation to Harpers Ferry Historical Association to help support Harpers Ferry NHP. Learn more about how the Harpers Ferry Historical Association supports the National Park Service. Join our partner - become a member today! For more information contact our partner at:  Harpers Ferry Historical Association P.O. Box 197 Harpers Ferry, WV 25425 Phone: 304-535-6881 Fax: 304-535-6749 Email: hfha@earthlink.net
